io.sarl.lang.core

Interface AgentContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Context

    public interface AgentContext
    An AgentContext defines the boundary of a sub-system, and gathers a collection of Spaces. Each context has a default context that provides a basic interaction context.
    Version:
    0.7.0 2018-02-22 15:33:31
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.lang
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.lang.core

      • getDefaultSpace

        @Pure
def getDefaultSpace() : EventSpace 
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Replies the default space of the context. The default space is assumed to be always an event-based space.
        Returns:
        the default space.

        Description copied from interface: AgentContext

        Returns:

      • getSpaces

        @Pure
def getSpaces(spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>) : SynchronizedIterable<S>  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Replies all the spaces that are implementing the given specification.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spec - specification of the space to retreive.
        Returns:
        the spaces associated to the given space specification.

      • createSpace

        def createSpace(spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>,
                spaceUUID : UUID,
                creationParams : Object*) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Create an instance of space following the given specification. This function always creates a new instance of space. It means that is a space with the given identifier already exists, this function does nothing and replies null. If you want to find an existing space prior to the creation of a new one, you should use AgentContext.getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...).
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the created space.
        Parameters:
        spec - specification of the space to create.
        spaceUUID - identifier of the new space.
        creationParams - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the new space, or null if the space already exists.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getSpace(UUID)

      • getOrCreateSpace

        @Deprecated
default def getOrCreateSpace(spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>,
                                         spaceUUID : UUID,
                                         creationParams : Object*) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Deprecated. see AgentContext.getOrCreateSpaceWithSpec(Class, UUID, Object...)
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Retreive or create an instance of space which was created with the given specification.

        This function tries to find a space that was created with the given specification. If none was found, this function creates a new space with the given space identifier and creation parameters.

        Caution: The spaceUUID parameter is used only if no existing space created with the given specification was found.

        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spec - specification of the space to retreive/create.
        spaceUUID - identifier used only when creating the space.
        creationParams - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the space, never null.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.getOrCreateSpaceWithID(UUID, Class, Object...), AgentContext.createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getSpace(UUID)

      • getOrCreateSpaceWithSpec

        def getOrCreateSpaceWithSpec(spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>,
                             spaceUUID : UUID,
                             creationParams : Object*) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Retreive or create an instance of space which was created with the given specification.

        This function tries to find a space that was created with the given specification. If none was found, this function creates a new space with the given space identifier and creation parameters.

        Caution: The spaceUUID parameter is used only if no existing space created with the given specification was found.

        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spec - specification of the space to retreive/create.
        spaceUUID - identifier used only when creating the space.
        creationParams - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the space, never null.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.getOrCreateSpaceWithID(UUID, Class, Object...), AgentContext.createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getSpace(UUID)

      • getOrCreateSpaceWithID

        @Deprecated
default def getOrCreateSpaceWithID(spaceUUID : UUID,
                                               spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>,
                                               creationParams : Object*) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Deprecated. see AgentContext.getOrCreateSpaceWithID(Class, UUID, Object...)
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Retreive or create an instance of space with the given identifier.

        This function tries to find a space with the given identifier. If none was found, this function creates a new space with the given specification and creation parameters.

        Caution: The spaceUUID parameter is given to the specification when creating the space.

        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spaceUUID - identifier of the space.
        spec - specification of the space for creating the space.
        creationParams - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the space, never null.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.getOrCreateSpaceWithID(UUID, Class, Object...), AgentContext.createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getSpace(UUID)

      • getOrCreateSpaceWithID

        def getOrCreateSpaceWithID(spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>,
                           spaceUUID : UUID,
                           creationParams : Object*) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Retreive or create an instance of space with the given identifier.

        This function tries to find a space with the given identifier. If none was found, this function creates a new space with the given specification and creation parameters.

        Caution: The spaceUUID parameter is given to the specification when creating the space.

        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spaceUUID - identifier of the space.
        spec - specification of the space for creating the space.
        creationParams - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the space, never null.
        Since:
        0.6
        See Also:
        AgentContext.getOrCreateSpaceWithID(UUID, Class, Object...), AgentContext.createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getSpace(UUID)

      • getSpace

        @Pure
def getSpace(spaceUUID : UUID) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Retreive, but do not create, an instance of space following the given ID. This function tries to find a space that fits the given specification. If none was found, this function replies null.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spaceUUID - identifier of the space.
        Returns:
        the space, or null if there is no space found.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...)
